item.title: CVE-2023-41270|2024-08-02T18:54:04.989Z -- samsung%20tv -- ue40d7000
item.description: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts vulnerability in Samsung Smart TV UE40D7000 version T-GAPDEUC-1033.2 and before allows attackers to cause a denial of service via WPS attack tools.
